Were you a Lego set kid or a giant-bucket-of-Legos kid? I was a sets kid all the way — I loved, and still love, the zen feeling of building something incredible a little bit at a time. Also, every time I tried to build something from the giant bucket, it fell apart immediately, but let's not dwell on that. We've just finished trawling the net for the best [Cyber Monday](https://www.engadget.com/deals/cyber-monday-deals-on-tech-for-2025-the-best-sales-from-apple-amazon-lego-dyson-disney-and-others-are-up-to-50-percent-off-170028712.html) deals on Lego sets. While the day is over, the Lego sales aren't; some sets are still up to 50% off. We've gathered them all on the list below, so act while you've still got time.

It's a good idea to use a [price tracker](https://camelcamelcamel.com/) to see if you're getting the best Lego Cyber Monday deals. You'll find Lego bargains this holiday season at retailers like [Amazon](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=7853fe12-4433-48bd-b28e-95974dab5cba&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Amazon&linkText=Amazon&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL3M_&signature=AQAAAWfl2SxSe3U0JXjmcxaoyhdvQnfXOQO5G1Rcp4NecrHC&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fs%3Fk%3Dlego%26rh%3Dp_n_deal_type%253A23566065011) and [Walmart](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=7853fe12-4433-48bd-b28e-95974dab5cba&featureId=text-link&merchantName=Walmart&linkText=Walmart&_cG92aWQ9RVRTX0QwN19WU0JfQnVpbGRpbmdTZXRzX1ZGX0JSTkRfU1JDSC1MRUdPU2VhcmNoX0xFR09CcmFuZFNob3AifQ&signature=AQAAAWYXoYU2SEdlPLJykAttYYyOl__1FbLPCrK-BBnJVV1u&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fbrand%2Flego%2F10030096%3Fpovid%3DETS_D07_VSB_BuildingSets_VF_BRND_SRCH-LEGOSearch_LEGOBrandShop), but don't overlook [Lego's own site](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=7853fe12-4433-48bd-b28e-95974dab5cba&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Lego%27s+own+site&&signature=AQAAAQpKumWoj1_5TUuki_HpWo-5CeqI50CRDZEIeCP7nXZK&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fcategories%2Fsales-and-deals). If you join the free [Lego Insiders](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=7853fe12-4433-48bd-b28e-95974dab5cba&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Lego+Insiders&custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5sZWdvLmNvbS9lbi11cy9pbnNpZGVycyIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiNzg1M2ZlMTItNDQzMy00OGJkLWIyOGUtOTU5NzRkYWI1Y2JhIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5sZWdvLmNvbS9lbi11cy9pbnNpZGVycyJ9&signature=AQAAAXs9Lj1a7j9U2ODtmawCgRB6GGu5JUe2cw-yxS0RUu33&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Finsiders) program, you'll get special discounts and exclusive member gifts with each purchase, plus points you can redeem for your next set or bucket.

You can now officially backorder the hottest Lego gift of the season, the [Star Trek USS Enterprise set](https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=70bceed8-b1ae-4af0-9fde-faa9258e1bc8&siteId=us-engadget&pageId=1p-autolink&contentUuid=7853fe12-4433-48bd-b28e-95974dab5cba&featureId=text-link&merchantName=LEGO&linkText=Star+Trek+USS+Enterprise+set&&signature=AQAAAUmvobmlUt96tJATKdveW-R3Xvj9AWmyTYwQv9nEcVYS&gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lego.com%2Fen-us%2Fproduct%2Fstar-trek-u-s-s-enterprise-ncc-1701-d-10356), which was [just announced](https://www.engadget.com/entertainment/legos-star-trek-uss-enterprise-set-arrives-on-black-friday-173414532.html). With a titanic 3,600 pieces and mini-figures of the whole Next Generation crew, it's a must-have for any Star Trek fans. The set is now available for $400.
